FuncDef:
The access user-flow-statistics enable command enables user traffic statistics collection based on inner or outer VLAN IDs on a device.
The undo access user-flow-statistics enable command disables user traffic statistics collection based on inner or outer VLAN IDs on a device.
By default, user traffic statistics collection based on inner or outer VLAN IDs on a device is not enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable user traffic statistics collection based on inner or outer VLAN IDs on a device, run the access user-flow-statistics enable command.
Configuration Impact
This command takes effect only for subsequent user traffic.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the display vlan-statistics { pevlan pe-vlan-id | cevlan ce-vlan-id } command to check user traffic statistics based on a specified inner or outer VLAN ID on the device.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
